title: Abram and Lot Separate
summary: Genesis 13 describes how Abram and Lot separate due to their growing flocks. Lot chooses the fertile Jordan Valley, while Abram stays in Canaan. God reaffirms His promise to Abram.

faq.question: Why did Abram and Lot separate?
faq.answer: Their possessions were too great to live together peacefully, so they parted ways.

faq.question: What did God promise Abram after Lot left?
faq.answer: That all the land Abram could see would be given to him and his descendants forever.
